content: To confirm, if using _query with POST, the body should be a Parameters instance, not a form-encoded instance, correct? (@Grahame Grieve )

(the logic being that there's no constraint that the associated operation definition can only include parameters expressible on the URL, and the form-encoded approach wouldn't work for complex parameters.)
I certainly support posts encoded as a form not a parameters. I don't think we've made any hard rules about that
So three options then - URL, body as form parameters and body as Parameters?
